description:

Get on XP-Pen site: https://www.xp-pen.com/store/buy/artist-24-pro-gen2-4k.html

There are 2 new Gen 2 24" XP-Pen tablets this year. One is full 4k while the other is 2.5k but with a higher 165htz refresh rate. I'm reviewing both in this video and I'll break down the differences between them.
